resources:
NC Mod Maker Choose Project Enter Project name(Open project when exist) Project： File Uri： File Name： File Size： Requiring Permissions Requiring Permissions to work:read and write your storage(exclude micro SD card) Exit Are you sure about that? Oops!! oh no,we have some problem take screenshot and report to developer \n email:jam9112229@gmail.com Apply Success OK Yes Accept Deny Wait Select Build mod pack CaptainVoice PrimarySound(GunSound) Err:01 No Project Name Err:02 No Pack Name/Author/Info/Version Autopilot：when Autopilot is enabled,disabled or end Battlestart：when Battle Start "Cons：when consumables activate or deactivate
-AAActive：when AA activate
-AAEnd：when AA deactivate
-EngineBoostActive：when EngineBoost activate
-EngineBoostActive_Shima：when Shimakaze activate EngineBoost
-EngineBoostEnd：when EngineBoost deactivate
-FrontierActive：when Frontline Station activate -JP carrier consumables
-FrontierEnd：when Frontline Station deactivate -JP carrier consumables
-ProblemSolved_Fire：when damage control activate -fire
-ProblemSolved_Flood：when EngineBoost activate -flood
-SmokeActive：when smoke generator activate
-SmokeEnd：when smoke generator deactivate " CriticalFlooding：when flooding Detection：when being spotted or spot enemy Domination：domination status,domination point status
-Ally_Capture：Ally taken a key point
-Ally_NearWin：Ally domination point above 800
-Enemy_Capture：Enemy taken a key point
-Enemy_NearWin：Enemy domination point above 800 DoubleKill：when double-bang Fire：when ship on fire FriendlyHit：when hit ally FirstKill：First Blood "HitAndKill：when destroy or good hits
-DestroyAlly：Destroy Ally ships
—AirCarrier：Destroy Ally Carrier
—Battleship：Destroy Ally Battleship
—Cruiser：Destroy Ally Cruiser
—Destroyer：Destroy Ally Destroyer
-DestroyEnemy：Destroy Enemy ships
—AirCarrier：Destroy Enemy Carrier
—Battleship：Destroy Enemy Battleship
—Cruiser：Destroy Enemy Cruiser
—Destroyer：Destroy Enemy Destroyer
-GoodHit：Citadel or torpedo hit " LastHope：when being the last one of team ModuleDisable：when module been destroyed or disabled
-Engine：engine disabled
-MainGun：main battery destroyed or disabled
—Crit：main battery disabled
—Die：main battery destroyed
-StearingGear：steering gear disabled
-TorpedoTube：torpedo tube destroyed or disabled "PlaneGroupId：plane squadron id
-DiveBomber：dive bomber squadron
-Fighter：fighter squadron
-TorpedoBomber：torpedo bomber squadron" PlaneState：squadron status
-DiveBomber：dive bomber squadron
-Fighter：fighter squadron
-TorpedoBomber：torpedo bomber squadron
—AirBorne：squadron take off
—AtPos：squadron is at position and waiting for command
—Destroy：squadron been shot down
—Engage：squadron is engaging enemy
—Land：squadron return to ship
—Ready：squadron is ready for take off
—TangoDown：squadron shot down enemy
—UnderAttack：squadron is under attack TeamKillPunishment：team kill punishment alert List<--> Anti Aircraft Gunnery Shell Hit Torpedo Launch Torpedo Hit Plane Dive Anti Aircraft<--> Medium and ShortRange Long Range firerate_slow.wav firerate_fast.wav firerate_faster.wav firerate_fastest.wav antiairgun.wav Gunnery<--> Main Battery Secondary 120mmIJN.wav 127mmIJN.wav 127mmUSN.wav 140mmIJN.wav 152mmIJN.wav 152mmUSN.wav 155mmIJN.wav 203mmIJN.wav 203mmUSN.wav 356mmALL.wav 406mmUSN.wav 410mmALL.wav 460mmIJN.wav 510mmIJN.wav railgun.wav SecondaryTurrentsSound.wav Shell Hit<--> Battleship Carrier Cruiser Destroyer Critical Ocean Author： Project Type： Mod Pack Name： Mod Info： Mod Version：if you\'re keep updating your mods,version of latest modpack should higher than previous one Preview(Optional)： Delete project after build Running…
